job.description: pSoftware Developer  Award Winning Fintech  up to 120000ppbrppstrongJob titlestrong Software DeveloperppstrongClientstrong Multi Award Winning FintechppstrongSalarystrong Up to 120000  bonus  packageppstrongLocationstrong BostonppbrppMy client is doing exceptionally well at the moment so are looking to add a software developer to their expanding team You will join a company with a flat structure and gain a large amount of exposure to greenfield projects focusing on the finance arena They want someone that is eager to continue learning and someone with great energy who is keen to work in a fast paced environmentppbrppstrongCANDIDATE REQUIREMENTSstrongpulli2 years industry experience working in a software engineering roleliliDegree from reputable university with a high GPA in Computer scienceliliProficient with Java Python or CliliPassionate about technologyliliBubbly personality with a desire to learn and progressliulpbrppstrongDESIREABLEstrongpulliExperience working in a tech role within financial services would be nice to haveliulpbrppIf this suits you click apply and we can discuss the role in more depthp
